name: Bat shopping
description:
"Bat shopping" is a cute puzzle game.

What is the game about?

It's a quarantine time. One Bat decided to go to the shop to buy some products, but he forgot his mask and gloves! Help the poor little Bat buy all the necessary purchases and get out of the store, until evil Grannies killed him with toilet paper.

How to play?
— Use swipe to move Bat
— Use Ctrl to move camera away
— Solve different puzzles
— Stay away from angry Grannies
— Beer can help you to pass by Grannies
— Be careful with slippery floor
— Buy all the products from the shopping list
— Get to the grocery counter in time
